definitions.title: subst.
definitions.body: what is conspicuous or in front, always as

definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: in front of, in sight of, opposite to, [[נֶ֑גֶד]], cstr. [[נֶגֶד]], sf. [[נֶגְדִּי]] Ps 38:11 +, [[נֶגְדְְּ]] Ps 38:10 +, etc.; with [[ה]] loc. [[נֶ֫גְדָּה]] † Ps 116:14, Ps 116:18; —
as adv. accus. in front of,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: locally (rather stronger and distincter than [[לִפְנֵי]]), (a) Ge 31:32 [[נֶגֶד אַחֵינוּ הַכֶּר־נׇא]] in front of  our brethren own it, now, v:Ge 31:37, Ge 47:15 [[ולמה נמות]] [[נגדך]] why should we die in thy sight ? Ex 19:2 Isr. encamped [[נגד ההר]] in front of  the mountain, Ex 34:10 [[נגד כל־עמך אעשׂה נִפְלָאׂת]], before, in sight of, all thy people (cf. Ps 78:12), Jos 3:16 the people passed over [[נגד ירחו]] in front of  J., 1Ki 20:27, etc.; Ne 3:23 in front of  their house, v:Ne 3:29; ([[כל]])[[נגד ]] [[ישׂראל]] De 31:11, Jos 8:35 = 1Sa 15:30, 2Sa 12:12 +; 1Ki 21:13 set Naboth [[נֶגֶד הָעָם]]; ´[[נגד י]] 1Sa 12:3, 1Sa 16:6 [[מְשִׁיחוֹ]] ´[[אַךְ נֶגֶד י]], so [[נֶגְדִּי]] Ps 89:37, [[נֶגְדּוֹ]] Ps 18:13; [[נגד]] [[השׁמשׁ]] Nu 25:4, 2Sa 12:12; Ps 22:26 [[יראיו]] ´[[נ]], Ps 52:9 (so poet. [[נֶגְדָּה לְ]] Ps 116:14, Ps 116:18); hostilely, Job 10:17; with collat. idea of to the mortification of, Ps 23:5, Ps 31:20, cf. Joe 1:16; with collat. idea of being open or known to, Pr 15:11 ´[[שׁאול ואבדון נגד י]], Job 26:6; Ps 38:10 [[נגדך כל־תאותי]] (‖[[ממך לא נסתרה ]]), Ps 69:20 (‖[[יׇדַעְתָּ]]), Ps 119:168, Is 59:12; so [[נֶגֶד פָּנַי הָיוּ]] Ho 7:2. (b) with reflex. sf., and vb. of motion, to go in front of oneself, i.e. straightforward, Jos 6:5 [[ועלו העם אישׁ]] [[נגדו]] each straightforward, v:Jos 6:20, Am 4:3, Je 31:29, Ne 12:37, cf. Pr 4:25.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: mentally, = vividly present to, Ps 38:18 [[ומכאובי נגדי תמיד]], Ps 44:16, Ps 51:5 [[וחטאתי נגדי תמיד]], Ps 109:15 ´[[י]] ´[[נ]] (remembered by): nearly = [[בְּעֵינׇיו]], [[כְּאַיִן נֶגְדּוֹ]] Is 40:17, Ps 39:6; so ´[[וְנ]] [[פְּנֵיהֶם נְבוֹנִים]] Is 5:21. But Ex 10:10 [[כי רעה נגד פניכם]] before your face is = in your view, or purpose (cf. [[לא אשׁית לְנֶגֶד עֵינַי דבר־בליעל]] Ps 101:3).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: †[[כְּנֶגֶד]] acc. to what is in front of = corresponding to, Ge 2:18 I will make him [[עֵזֶר כְּנֶגְדּוֹ]] a help corresponding to him i.e. equal and adequate to himself, v:Ge 2:20 among the animals there was no [[עֵזֶר כְּנֶגְדּוֹ]].

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[לְנֶגֶד]] in front of, before, Ge 33:12 [[וְאֵֽלְכָה לְנֶנְדְֶָּ]], Nu 22:32, 2Ki 1:13 fell on his knees [[לנגד אליהו]], Is 1:7 your ground [[לנגדכם זרים אׂכלים אותהּ]]; with [[עָמַד]] Jos 5:13, Da 8:15, Da 10:16, in a hostile sense v:Da 10:13, cf. Pr 21:30; in the sight or presence of, Hb Hab 1:3 [[וְשׁׂד וְחָמָס לְנֶגְדִּי]], Ps 39:2 [[בעוד רשׁע לנגדי]], Ps 50:8 [[ועולֽתיך לנגדי תמיד]], Ne 3:37; opposite to (prob. of opposite choirs), Ne 12:9, Ne 12:24; = parallel to, 1Ch 5:11; = over, for, a business (peculiar) Ne 11:22; fig. of what is visible morally, Ps 18:23 [[כי כל משׁפטיו לנגדי]] (‖[[לאׁ אָסִיר מֶנִּי]]), with to set or place Ps 16:8, Ps 54:5 [[לא שׂמו אלהים לנגדם]] (cf. Ps 86:14, ), Ps 90:8; oft. in the phrase …[[לְנֶגֶד עֵינֵי ]], both lit., as Job 4:16 [[תְּמוּנׇה]] [[עֵינׇ֑י]] ´[[לנ]], Ps 5:6 [[עיניך]] ´[[לא יתיחבו הוללים לנ]] (cf. Ps 101:7); and in a moral sense, Ps 18:25 [[עיניו]] ´[[כְּבׂר ידי לנ]], Ps 26:3 [[עיני]] ´[[כי חסדך לנ]] i.e. is ever present to my mind, Ps 36:2 [[עיניו]] ´[[אין פחד אלהים לנ]] i.e. he has no eye to discern God's awe-inspiring judgments (cf. Ps 10:5); with [[לא אשׁית]] i.e. have in view, purpose (‖[[שׂנאתי]]) Ps 101:3.

definitions.title: 1 c
definitions.body: ) the front, in front, opposite, ex adverso, Ge 21:16 [[ותשׁב להּ מנגד]] sat her down opposite, v:Ge 21:16, 2Ki 2:7; De 28:66 [[והיו חייך תלואים לך מנגד]] shall be hung up for thee in front (i.e. suspended, as by a thread, in front of thee); Ju Jdg 9:17 [[וישׁלך נפשׁו מנגד]] and flung away his life in front or straight away (i.e. hazarded it); = some way off, from or at a distance, Nu 2:2, De 32:52 [[כי מִנֶּגֶד]] [[תראה את הארץ]], 2Ki 2:15 ´[[וַיִּרְאֻהוּ מנ]] at a distance, 2Ki 3:22, 2Ki 4:25; aloof, 2Sa 18:13 [[ואתה תתיחב מנגד]], Ob 1:11 (b) as a

definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: (a) from the front of, away from, Ct So 6:5 [[הָסֵבִּי עֵינַיִךְ מִנֶּגְדִּי]], 1Sa 26:20 [[אל־יפׂל]] ´[[פני י]] ´[[דמי ארחה מנ]]; [[מנגד עיני]] from before the eyes of, with verbs of removing Is 1:16, cutting off Ps 31:23, Jon 2:5, hiding Am 9:3, Je 16:17. (b) opposite to, Ne 3:19, Ne 3:25, Ne 3:27; at a distance from, Ps 10:5 [[מרום משׁפטיך מנגדו]], Ps 38:12 [[מנגד נגעי יעמדו]]. (g) [[מִנֶּגֶד לְ]] from before, Pr 14:7, in front of Ju Jdg 20:34.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: † [[עַד נֶגֶד]] as far as the front of, Ne 3:16, Ne 3:26.
